## Course Data Update Required

The course schedule will be automatically updated when the course data scraper is re-enabled. For now, please refer to the main teaching page for course information.
:::

::: {.course-table}

```{python}
#| echo: false

import pandas as pd
import os
from datetime import datetime

# Try to load course data (correct relative path from this location)
csv_path = "../data/franklin_courses.csv"

if os.path.exists(csv_path):
    try:
        df = pd.read_csv(csv_path)
        if len(df) > 0:
            print(f"**📊 Course data loaded: {len(df)} courses found**")
            print(f"*Last updated: {datetime.now().strftime('%B %d, %Y at %I:%M %p')}*")
        else:
            print("**⚠️ Course Scraping Issue**")
            print("The course scraper ran successfully but found no course data. This may be due to:")
            print("- Changes in the Franklin University website structure")
            print("- Temporary website maintenance")
            print("- Network connectivity issues during scraping")
            print("\n*Please check back later or contact the site administrator.*")
            df = None
    except Exception as e:
        print("**❌ Data Loading Error**")
        print(f"Unable to load course data: {str(e)}")
        print("\n*Please contact the site administrator if this issue persists.*")
        df = None
else:
    print("**❌ Course Data Unavailable**")
    print("The course scraper failed to collect data. This may be due to:")
    print("- Technical issues with the scraping process")
    print("- Network connectivity problems")
    print("- Changes in the source website")
    print("\n*The automated course data collection will retry during the next scheduled update.*")
    df = None
```

## 📊 Quick Statistics

```{python}
#| echo: false
if os.path.exists(csv_path):
    # Calculate quick stats
    total_sections = len(df)
    total_enrollment = df['Enrolled_Seats'].sum()
    total_capacity = df['Total_Seats'].sum()
    utilization = (total_enrollment / total_capacity * 100) if total_capacity > 0 else 0
    first_term_count = len(df[df['First_Term'] == 'Yes'])
    
    print(f"- **Total Sections:** {total_sections}")
    print(f"- **Total Enrollment:** {total_enrollment} students")
    print(f"- **Capacity Utilization:** {utilization:.1f}%")
    print(f"- **First-term Courses:** {first_term_count}")
```
